# archestra_prompt (Data Source)

Provides information about a specific Archestra prompt.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "archestra_prompt" "example_by_id" {
  id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
}

data "archestra_prompt" "example_by_name" {
  name = "example-prompt"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Prompt identifier
- `name` (String) The name of the prompt

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt was created
- `profile_id` (String) The profile identifier this prompt belongs to
- `system_prompt` (String) The system prompt template
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt was last updated
- `user_prompt` (String) The user prompt template
- `version` (Number) The version of the prompt
